Title: Hex
Actors: Christina Cole, Jemima Rooper, Laura Pyper, Amber Sainsbury, Michael Fassbender, Anna Wilson-Jones, Colin Salmon, Jamie Davis, Joseph Morgan, Jemima Abey, Joseph Beattie, Sam Troughton
Plot: Cassie is a shy college girl who wants to be accepted by others, but is only truly loved by her best friend Thelma. Cassie later discovers that she possesses dangerous powers, and is being drawn into a world thats far beyond her control. And the man that she should fear the most manages to find a way into her heart.
